attributes.background: The government need to cap petrol and diesel prices as they keep going up at the moment 5p a day. In the long run a lot of use won’t be able to work. Then there will be a massive amount of people claiming benefits.

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Hold an inquiry into fuel prices and introduce increased regulation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603624
